TopicTitle: Inexplicable phantom impulse during manual RCS deactivation

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Microsoft Windows 10 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X 8-Core | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 | RAM: 15.95

 

Severity: Mid

Frequency: Low

I have noticed a few other times that I will occasionally get an issue where the orbital path of a craft changes dramatically for no clear reason. This has never been too much of an issue, but I was just coming in for a docking procedure, lining up my craft with the target at near-matched speeds with RCS, I took my finger off of the RCS button and my craft inexplicably gained 60 m/s of speed in the radial out direction, instantaneously.

I couldn't say why this happened, but it seems like a disruptive issue (I had to reload). Perhaps something to do with momentary game lag prolonging impulse applications?
